ConfigurationParameter.Description: Preferred refund tender when return with receipt value exceeds originally paid amount

ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum allowed limit for refund with receipt

ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if manager can override the maximum refund limit

ConfigurationParameter.Description: Allow Bank Receipt in this tender

ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Restrict return of item in mixed basket
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Restrict return of items purchased with the tender in mixed basket

ConfigurationParameter.Description: Restrict redemption of credit notes issued in selected business units
